onChange.script:
# reset the dates to defaults when a participant is picked from the participant table	
	if self.params.Selected_Id is None:
		self.getChild("root").getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.custom.defaultDates.start
		self.getChild("root").getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpireDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.custom.defaultDates.expiry

transforms.code:
inShelter = self.view.custom.inShelter
	options = []
	name = 'Activity Center'
	options.append({'label': name, 'value': name})
	
	
	
	if inShelter:
		if 'Apartments' in self.view.custom.shelterName:
			options = []
			name = '532 Apartments'
			options.append({'label': name, 'value': name})
		
			name = '705 Apartments'
			options.append({'label': name, 'value': name})
		else:
			name = 'Guest House Bin'
			options.append({'label': name, 'value': name})
			
			name = 'Guest House Fridge'
			options.append({'label': name, 'value': name})
			
			name = 'Black Box'
			options.append({'label': name, 'value': name})
			
			
		
		
	return options

newDataset = value
	selectedLocation = self.parent.parent.getChild("Location").custom.SelectedColumn
	if selectedLocation == '705 Apartments' or selectedLocation == '532 Apartments':
		newDataset = self.view.custom.availableBinsForLocation
	if self.view.custom.selectedBin is not None and self.view.custom.selectedBin.bin != -1:
		newRow = [self.view.custom.selectedBin.bin,self.view.custom.selectedBin.bin]
		newDataset = system.dataset.addRow(newDataset,newRow)
	return newDataset

data = value.data
#	selection = value.selection
	
	options = []
#	selected = ''
#	try:
#		selected = selection.data[0].name
#	except:
#		pass
#	
	for med in data:
		options.append({'style': {
								  "classes": "Table/Cell_Detail",
								  "paddingLeft": "10px"
								},
						'value': {'label': med['Name']},
						'name': med['Name'],
						"id": med['Id'],
						#'selected': med['Name'] == selected
						})
	return options

config.expression:
if({../FlexContainer/Conditional_Text.props.params.text} = ''
	,'Enter something into the search field to show results'
	,'No results found or matching medications already selected.'
)

config.script:
name = self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Conditional_Text").props.params.text
	actor = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	
#	system.perspective.print(name + ' ' + actor)
	
	system.db.runNamedQuery(path='Participants/Medications/AddMedication',
							parameters={'name': name, 'actor': actor}
							)
	self.getSibling("Table").refreshBinding('custom.meds_raw')
	self.refreshBinding('custom.exactMatch')

transforms.code: return "'" + "','".join(value) + "'"

config.expression: 'id:' + if({view.params.Selected_Id} = None, 'None', {view.params.Selected_Id}) + ' pid:' + if({view.params.Selected_Participant_Id} = None, 'None', {view.params.Selected_Participant_Id}) + ' (FOR TESTING ONLY)'

config.script:
self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Location").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = ''
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = ''
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.view.custom.defaultDates.start
	self.view.params.Selected_Participant_Id = -1
	self.view.params.Selected_Id = None
	self.parent.parent.getChild("Medication Selection").getChild("Selected").getChild("Table").custom.medications = []
	self.parent.parent.getChild("Medication Selection").getChild("Available").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Conditional_Text").props.params.text = ''
	self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("CheckoutDate").props.text = ''

import traceback
	try:
		project = 'RITI'
		errorMessage = ""
		allData = 1
		shelterId = self.view.custom.shelterId
		id = self.view.params.Selected_Id
		now = system.date.now()
		location = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Location").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
		if location is None or location == -1:
			errorMessage = "NO LOCATION SELECTED"
			allData = 0
		
		bin = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
		if bin is None:
			bin = -1
		
		if bin == -1 and ( location == 'Guest House Bin' or location == '705 Apartments' or location == '532 Apartments'):
			allData = 0
			errorMessage = "NO BIN SELECTED"
		elif bin != -1 and ( location == 'Guest House Bin' or location == '705 Apartments' or location == '532 Apartments') and ( self.view.custom.selectedBin is None or bin != self.view.custom.selectedBin.bin ) and self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Status").custom.Status != 'Available':
			## allow when original and new bin are same and status is in-use , this is for update cases
			allData = 0
			errorMessage = "SELECTED BIN IS NOT AVAILABLE"
		
		startDate = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value
		if not startDate:
			allData = 0
			errorMessage = "NO START DATE SELECTED"
		
		
		
		participantId = self.view.params.Selected_Participant_Id
		if participantId is None or participantId == -1 or participantId == 0:
			allData = 0
			errorMessage = "NO PARTICIPANT SELECTED"
			
		selectedMedications = self.parent.parent.getChild("Medication Selection").getChild("Selected").getChild("Table").custom.medications_csv
#		system.perspective.print("selectedMedications")
#		system.perspective.print(selectedMedications)
#		system.perspective.print("location")
#		system.perspective.print(location)
		if ( location == 'Guest House Bin' or location == "Black Box") and ( selectedMedications == None or selectedMedications == "" or selectedMedications == "''" or len(selectedMedications) == 0):
			allData = 0
			errorMessage = "NO MEDICINES SELECTED"
		
		if allData == 0:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage(errorMessage)
			return
		
		
		selectedMedications = selectedMedications.replace("'","")
		if id is None or id == -1: # add a new bin entry
			participantAllowedToStore = True
			## check if location is guest house bin and participant has already checked into a bin
			
			sqlQuery = """
			SELECT * FROM participant.MedicationBinsLog
			where participantId = ? AND location = ? and exitAction is NULL 
			"""
				
			returnData = system.db.runPrepQuery(sqlQuery, [participantId, location])
			if returnData is not None and returnData.getRowCount() > 0:
				participantAllowedToStore = False
			
			if participantAllowedToStore == True:
				params = {'participantId': participantId,
						  'location'     : location,
						  'bin'          : bin,
						  'startOn'      : startDate,
						  'shelterId'     : shelterId,
						  'selectedMedications': selectedMedications}
				
#				system.perspective.print("=========MedicationBin Assign Bin params=========")
#				system.perspective.print(params)	
				system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project, path='Participants/Medications/AssignBin', parameters =params)
			else:
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("PARTICIPANT IS ALREADY USING SAME LOCATION OR OTHER BIN")
				return
		else: # update an existing new bin entry
			params = {'location' : location,
					  'bin'      : bin,
					  'startOn'  : startDate,
					  'id'       : id,
					  'selectedMedications': selectedMedications}
			
#			system.perspective.print("=========StorageBin Update Bin params=========")
#			system.perspective.print(params)
			
			system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project, path='Participants/Medications/UpdateBin', parameters =params)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Medication bin created successfully")
		system.perspective.sendMessage('storage_bin_refresh', payload = {})
		self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Status").refreshBinding("custom.Status")
		
		## also clear the form
		self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Location").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = ''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = ''
		self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.view.custom.defaultDates.start
		self.view.params.Selected_Participant_Id = -1
		self.view.params.Selected_Id = None
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Medication Selection").getChild("Selected").getChild("Table").custom.medications = []
		self.view.getChild("root").custom.currentAddedMedications = []
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Medication Selection").getChild("Available").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Conditional_Text").props.params.text = ''
	
	except:
		system.perspective.print('ERROR OCCURED WHILE TRYING TO SAVE. Details below.')
		system.perspective.print(traceback.format_exc())

params = {'ExitAction': self.custom.ActionId, 
			  'StorageBinLogId': self.view.params.Selected_Id,
			  'location': self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Location").getChild("Dropdown").props.value,
			  'Bin': self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
			  }
	dockId = 'MedicationBinModify'
	
	system.perspective.openDock(id = dockId,
								params = params)

params = {'ExitAction': self.custom.ActionId, 
			  'StorageBinLogId': self.view.params.Selected_Id,
			  'location': self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Location").getChild("Dropdown").props.value,
			  'Bin': self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
			  }
	dockId = 'MedicationBinModify'
	
	system.perspective.openDock(id = dockId,
								params = params)

props.text: Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False

config.script:
import traceback
	try:
		self.view.params.Selected_Id = event.value['id']
		
		self.parent.getChild("Medications Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Location").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = event.value['location']
		self.parent.getChild("Medications Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").refreshBinding("props.options")
		self.parent.getChild("Medications Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = event.value['bin']
		self.parent.getChild("Medications Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = event.value['startOn']
		self.view.params.Selected_Participant_Id = event.value['participantId']
		self.view.custom.selectedMedications = event.value['selectedMedications']
		self.parent.getChild("Medications Lookup Flex").getChild("Medication Selection").getChild("Selected").getChild("Table").custom.medications = []
		if self.view.custom.selectedMedications != None and self.view.custom.selectedMedications != '':
			if "," in self.view.custom.selectedMedications:
				self.parent.getChild("Medications Lookup Flex").getChild("Medication Selection").getChild("Selected").getChild("Table").custom.medications = str(self.view.custom.selectedMedications).split(",")
			else:
				self.parent.getChild("Medications Lookup Flex").getChild("Medication Selection").getChild("Selected").getChild("Table").custom.medications.append(self.view.custom.selectedMedications)
		self.view.custom.selectedCheckOut = event.value['checkOutDate']
	except:
		system.perspective.print(traceback.format_exc())

transforms.code:
# val has: id action actionDate col bin participantId pfname pmname plname employeeId efname emname elname
	# res has: [id] pname column bin start exp exit evict sname
	result = []
	if value is not None:
		for row in value:
			rowStruct = {}
			
			
			rowValue = {}
			rowValue['id'] = row['id']
			rowValue['location'] = row['location']
			if row['bin'] == -1:
				rowValue['bin'] = None
			else:
				rowValue['bin'] = row['bin']
			rowValue['participantId'] = row['participantId']
			rowValue['participantName'] = row['participantName']
			rowValue['startOn'] = row['startOn']
			rowValue['shelterName'] = row['shelterName']
			rowValue['selectedMedications'] = row['selectedMedications']
			
			exitAction = row['exitAction']
			exitedOn = row['exitedOn']
			exitedBy = row['exitedBy']
			disposedBy = row['disposedBy']
			disposedOn = row['disposedOn']
			if exitAction == 1: # participant bin was exited
				rowValue['exitedOn'] = exitedOn
				rowValue['exitActionBy'] = exitedBy
				rowValue['disposedOn'] = None
			elif exitAction == 2: # participant bin was disposed
				rowValue['exitedOn'] = None
				rowValue['exitActionBy'] = disposedBy
				rowValue['disposedOn'] = disposedOn
			else:
				rowValue['exitedOn'] = None
				rowValue['exitActionBy'] = None
				rowValue['disposedOn'] = None
			
			
			rowValue['checkOutDate'] = row['checkOutDate']	
			
			if row['checkOutDate']	is not None and row['exitAction'] is None and row['shelterId'] is not None:
				rowStruct['style'] = {'classes': 'Table/Cell_Detail_Red'}
			else:
				rowStruct['style'] = {'classes': 'Table/Cell_Detail'}
				
			rowStruct['value'] = rowValue
			result.append(rowStruct)
	
	return result
return "#FFFFFF00" if value is None or value == -1 else "#9AF4EB4D"
